Terms & Conditions

1. Eligibility: The $TORD Airdrop Campaign is open to all participants worldwide. You must complete the required tasks to earn entries.

2. No Purchase Necessary: No purchase is required to enter or receive tokens. Completing tasks does not guarantee token distribution.

3. Token Distribution: $TORD tokens will be distributed to eligible participants after the campaign ends. The amount received is proportional to entries earned.

4. Wallet Requirements: A valid BNB/BSC-compatible wallet address is required to receive tokens. Tord Labs is not responsible for tokens sent to incorrect addresses.

5. Fraud Prevention: Multiple entries using different identities or automated methods are prohibited. Fraudulent entries will be disqualified.

6. Changes: Tord Labs reserves the right to modify, suspend, or cancel the airdrop campaign at any time without prior notice.

7. Privacy: Wallet addresses and social account information collected are used solely for the purpose of this airdrop campaign.

8. Disclaimer: $TORD tokens are utility tokens. This airdrop does not constitute an investment offering. Participants should comply with their local regulations regarding cryptocurrency.
